channel.title: Need some help with points

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @Revolutionz Revolutionz
item.description:
@Revolutionz wrote:

[quote=“bengina, post:20, topic:329997”]What source are you using?

If its easyrsc then in player.java search for:

/** * Quest Points - Yong Min */

Under that add:

[code] /**
* Points
*/
private int points = 0;

public void setPoints(int i){
	points = i;
	actionSender.sendPoints();
}

public int getPoints() {
	return points;
}

[/code]

Then Search for :

setQuestPoints(Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("questpoints")));

Under that add:

setPoints(Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("points")));

Then search for:

sender.sendQuestPoints();

Under that add:

sender.sendPoints();

Then search for:

pr.setProperty("questpoints", "" + this.getQuestPoints());

Under that add:

pr.setProperty("points", "" + this.getPoints());

You will also need to add in the packet in Miscpacketbuilder and have the same info in the client for example :

/** * Updates the points */ public void sendPoints() { RSCPacketBuilder s = new RSCPacketBuilder(); s.setID(138); s.addint(player.getPoints()); packets.add(s.toPacket());

And in the client have it set to the same s.setID as above “setID(138);”

Also make sure you open the player template and add in points=0

Hope this helps :D[/quote]

Hello, thanks alot for the help.
I have something to ask you, if you possibly could add me on msn hohodyretcs@hotmail.com

Edit: I have gotten so far that when I kill a NPC I don’t recieve exp nor points lol (Y)

So basicly I would have this command im my mudclient

[code] if (command == 208) {
int pointer = 1;
int idx = data[(pointer++)] & 0xFF;
int oldExp = this.playerStatExperience[idx];
this.playerStatCurrent[idx] = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[(pointer++)]);
this.playerStatBase[idx] = DataOperations.getUnsignedByte(data[(pointer++)]);
this.playerStatExperience[idx] = DataOperations.readInt(data, pointer);
pointer += 4;

     if (this.playerStatExperience[idx] > oldExp) {
       this.expGained += this.playerStatExperience[idx] - oldExp;
     }
     return;
   }[/code]

And this in my miscpacketbuilder

public void sendPoints() { RSCPacketBuilder s = new RSCPacketBuilder(); s.setID(208); s.addShort(player.getPoints()); packets.add(s.toPacket()); }

Would that be what you’re reffering to?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

What source are you using?

If its easyrsc then in player.java search for:

/** * Quest Points - Yong Min */

Under that add:

[code] /**
* Points
*/
private int points = 0;

public void setPoints(int i){
	points = i;
	actionSender.sendPoints();
}

public int getPoints() {
	return points;
}

[/code]

Then Search for :

setQuestPoints(Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("questpoints")));

Under that add:

setPoints(Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("points")));

Then search for:

sender.sendQuestPoints();

Under that add:

sender.sendPoints();

Then search for:

pr.setProperty("questpoints", "" + this.getQuestPoints());

Under that add:

pr.setProperty("points", "" + this.getPoints());

You will also need to add in the packet in Miscpacketbuilder and have the same info in the client for example :

/** * Updates the points */ public void sendPoints() { RSCPacketBuilder s = new RSCPacketBuilder(); s.setID(138); s.addint(player.getPoints()); packets.add(s.toPacket());

And in the client have it set to the same s.setID as above “setID(138);”

Also make sure you open the player template and add in points=0

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @Revolutionz Revolutionz
item.description:
@Revolutionz wrote:

Crooks:

[quote]Thank you for a real respond Crooks, is there elsewhere that I need to edit things?

No problems.
No, fightevent.java is the only file you need to edit to make it send points from a killed npc.

EDIT: cut it down:P you dont need all that.

[code]
if(newHp <= 0) {
opponent.killedBy(attacker, false);
if(attacker instanceof Player) {
Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker;
attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

                      }
                      attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON);
                      opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST);
              }
    }[/code][/quote]

This is the error it returns.

[code]ERROR: The process “java.exe” not found.
Buildfile: build.xml

compile:

oints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

Thank you for a real respond Crooks, is there elsewhere that I need to edit things?

No problems.
No, fightevent.java is the only file you need to edit to make it send points from a killed npc.

EDIT: cut it down:P you dont need all that.

[code]
if(newHp <= 0) {
opponent.killedBy(attacker, false);
if(attacker instanceof Player) {
Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker;
attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

                      }
                      attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON);
                      opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST);
              }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“Revolutionz, post:12, topic:329997”][quote author=Crooks link=topic=426381.msg3131906#msg3131906 date=1266586881]
Delete the exp thing you got there and use this.

attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

That (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3)); means you will get the NPCS combat X 3.
for example Man(cb9) = 27pts.

[/quote]

Thank you for a real respond Crooks, is there elsewhere that I need to edit things?
This is how my FightEvent looks like.

[code]package org.rscdaemon.server.event;
import java.util.Random;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.DataConversions;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.Formulae;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.;
import org.rscdaemon.server.states.CombatState;
import org.rscdaemon.server.entityhandling.defs.NPCDef;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class FightEvent extends DelayedEvent {
private Mob affectedMob;
private int hits;
private int firstHit;
private Random r = new Random();

public final int Rand(int low, int high)
{
   	return low + r.nextInt(high - low);
}

public FightEvent(Player owner, Mob affectedMob) {
	this(owner, affectedMob, false);
}

public FightEvent(Player owner, Mob affectedMob, boolean attacked) {
	super(owner, 1000);
	this.affectedMob = affectedMob;
	firstHit = attacked ? 1 : 0;
	hits = 0;
}

public void run() {
	if(!owner.loggedIn() || (affectedMob instanceof Player && !((Player)affectedMob).loggedIn())) {
		owner.resetCombat(CombatState.ERROR);
		affectedMob.resetCombat(CombatState.ERROR);
		return;
	}
	Mob attacker, opponent;
	if(hits++ % 2 == firstHit) {
		attacker = owner;
		opponent = affectedMob;
	}
	else {
		attacker = affectedMob;
		opponent = owner;
	}
	if(opponent.getHits() <= 0) {
		attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON);
  			opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST);
  			return;
	}
	attacker.incHitsMade();
	if(attacker instanceof Npc && opponent.isPrayerActivated(12)) {
		return;
	}
	int damage = Formulae.calcFightHit(attacker, opponent);
	opponent.setLastDamage(damage);
	int newHp = opponent.getHits() - damage;
	opponent.setHits(newHp);
	ArrayList<Player> playersToInform = new ArrayList<Player>();
	playersToInform.addAll(opponent.getViewArea().getPlayersInView());
	playersToInform.addAll(attacker.getViewArea().getPlayersInView());
	  		for(Player p : playersToInform) {
		p.informOfModifiedHits(opponent);
	}
	String combatSound = damage > 0 ? "combat1b" : "combat1a";
	if(opponent instanceof Player) {
		Player opponentPlayer = ((Player)opponent);
		opponentPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints(3);
		opponentPlayer.getActionSender().sendSound(combatSound);
	}
	if(attacker instanceof Player) {
		Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker;
		attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendSound(combatSound);
	}
	if(newHp <= 0) {
		opponent.killedBy(attacker, false);
		if(attacker instanceof Player) {
			Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker;
      			int exp = DataConversions.roundUp(Formulae.combatExperience(opponent) / 4.0D);
      			switch(attackerPlayer.getCombatStyle()) {
				case 0:
					for(int x = 0;x < 3;x++) {
						attackerPlayer.incExp(x, exp, true, true);
						attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints(x);
					}
					break;
				case 1:
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

					break;
				case 2:
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();
					break;
				case 3:
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();
					break;
			}
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();
		}
		attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON);
		opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST);
	}
}

public Mob getAffectedMob() {
	return affectedMob;
}

public boolean equals(Object o) {
	if(o instanceof FightEvent) {
		FightEvent e = (FightEvent)o;
		return e.belongsTo(owner) && e.getAffectedMob().equals(affectedMob);
	}
	return false;
}

}[/code][/quote]

fail quote, you will have to do the same with a mob.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @Revolutionz Revolutionz
item.description:
@Revolutionz wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:11, topic:329997”]Delete the exp thing you got there and use this.

attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

That (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3)); means you will get the NPCS combat X 3.
for example Man(cb9) = 27pts.[/quote]

Thank you for a real respond Crooks, is there elsewhere that I need to edit things?
This is how my FightEvent looks like.

[code]package org.rscdaemon.server.event;
import java.util.Random;

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.DataConversions;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.Formulae;
import org.rscdaemon.server.util.;
import org.rscdaemon.server.states.CombatState;
import org.rscdaemon.server.entityhandling.defs.NPCDef;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Npc;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class FightEvent extends DelayedEvent {
private Mob affectedMob;
private int hits;
private int firstHit;
private Random r = new Random();

public final int Rand(int low, int high)
{
   	return low + r.nextInt(high - low);
}

public FightEvent(Player owner, Mob affectedMob) {
	this(owner, affectedMob, false);
}

public FightEvent(Player owner, Mob affectedMob, boolean attacked) {
	super(owner, 1000);
	this.affectedMob = affectedMob;
	firstHit = attacked ? 1 : 0;
	hits = 0;
}

public void run() {
	if(!owner.loggedIn() || (affectedMob instanceof Player && !((Player)affectedMob).loggedIn())) {
		owner.resetCombat(CombatState.ERROR);
		affectedMob.resetCombat(CombatState.ERROR);
		return;
	}
	Mob attacker, opponent;
	if(hits++ % 2 == firstHit) {
		attacker = owner;
		opponent = affectedMob;
	}
	else {
		attacker = affectedMob;
		opponent = owner;
	}
	if(opponent.getHits() <= 0) {
		attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON);
  			opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST);
  			return;
	}
	attacker.incHitsMade();
	if(attacker instanceof Npc && opponent.isPrayerActivated(12)) {
		return;
	}
	int damage = Formulae.calcFightHit(attacker, opponent);
	opponent.setLastDamage(damage);
	int newHp = opponent.getHits() - damage;
	opponent.setHits(newHp);
	ArrayList<Player> playersToInform = new ArrayList<Player>();
	playersToInform.addAll(opponent.getViewArea().getPlayersInView());
	playersToInform.addAll(attacker.getViewArea().getPlayersInView());
	  		for(Player p : playersToInform) {
		p.informOfModifiedHits(opponent);
	}
	String combatSound = damage > 0 ? "combat1b" : "combat1a";
	if(opponent instanceof Player) {
		Player opponentPlayer = ((Player)opponent);
		opponentPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints(3);
		opponentPlayer.getActionSender().sendSound(combatSound);
	}
	if(attacker instanceof Player) {
		Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker;
		attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendSound(combatSound);
	}
	if(newHp <= 0) {
		opponent.killedBy(attacker, false);
		if(attacker instanceof Player) {
			Player attackerPlayer = (Player)attacker;
      			int exp = DataConversions.roundUp(Formulae.combatExperience(opponent) / 4.0D);
      			switch(attackerPlayer.getCombatStyle()) {
				case 0:
					for(int x = 0;x < 3;x++) {
						attackerPlayer.incExp(x, exp, true, true);
						attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints(x);
					}
					break;
				case 1:
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

					break;
				case 2:
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();
					break;
				case 3:
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();
					break;
			}
                    attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
                    attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();
		}
		attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON);
		opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST);
	}
}

public Mob getAffectedMob() {
	return affectedMob;
}

public boolean equals(Object o) {
	if(o instanceof FightEvent) {
		FightEvent e = (FightEvent)o;
		return e.belongsTo(owner) && e.getAffectedMob().equals(affectedMob);
	}
	return false;
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

@Crooks wrote:

Delete the exp thing you got there and use this.

attackerPlayer.setPoints(attackerPlayer.getPoints() + (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3));
attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendPoints();

That (opponent.getCombatLevel() * 3)); means you will get the NPCS combat X 3.
for example Man(cb9) = 27pts.

[/quote]

this is server and client help not free code area.[/quote]
fact is you are a no1 retard on this forum, since when did he ask for free codes? are you srsly so fucking stupid, hes asking to be pointed in the correct way, not asking for free codes u freak.

item.title: Need some help with points
item.dc:creator: @Revolutionz Revolutionz
item.description:
@Revolutionz wrote:

Okay, so I have finished up most of what I need client sided.

Now for the serversided part, I need to remove “exp” and add in “points” so whenever you kill a npc it gives you points which you can use with the points panel I created, this is what I have and I believe needs tweaking, not sure if that is all that needs tweaking though!

case 0: for(int x = 0;x < 3;x++) { attackerPlayer.incExp(x, exp, true, true); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendStat(x); } break; case 1: attackerPlayer.incExp(2, exp * 8, true, true); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendStat(2); break; case 2: attackerPlayer.incExp(0, exp * 8, true, true); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendStat(0); break; case 3: attackerPlayer.incExp(1, exp * 8, true, true); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendStat(1); break; } attackerPlayer.incExp(3, exp * 3, true, true); attackerPlayer.getActionSender().sendStat(3); } attacker.resetCombat(CombatState.WON); opponent.resetCombat(CombatState.LOST); } }

Read full topic
